OWNER_NUMBER.description: Put Your WhatsApp Number Link Device

MENU_IMAGE_URL.description: Add Your Imgae Url Bot Menu

PREFIX.description: Paste Your Bot Prefix Note! Don't Apply Null

MODE.description: Select Your Bot Work Type Public-Private-Inbox-Group

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Make It true If Want Always Online

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Make It true For Automatic Status Seen

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Make It true For Automatic Status Reaction Or Like

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Make It true For Auto Reply Msg On Status Seen

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Type custom message on status reply

ANTI_LINK.description: Make It true If You Want Bot Auto Remove link For Group

ADMIN_EVENTS.description: Make It true If Want Know Who Promote Or Demote A Member

WELCOME.description: Make It true If Want Goodbye And Welcome Message In Groups

ANTI_CALL.description: Make It true If You Want Bot Auto Call Rejected

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Make It true If You Want Auto Faik Recoding

AUTO_TYPING.description: Make It true If You Want Auto Faik Typing

AUTO_REACT.description: Make It true If You Want React On Every Message

CUSTOM_REACT.description: Make It true If You Want Hearts Reactions

ANTI_DEL_PATH.description: Change It To -same- If You Want To Resend Deleted Message In Same Chat Othwise -inbox-

ANTI_DELETE.description: Set true For Show Deleted Messages

READ_MESSAGE.description: Make It true If You Want Bot Read Your All Measage Just Now
